reviews.review_msg: worst.  prof.  ever.  scary, mean and dismissive.  hard marker.  avoid!

I took this course some time ago and it lead me to switch majors to philosophy. Sadly, they are not all like Phil Hanson. I highly recommend that anyone interested in philosophy take your core courses from him whenever possible. Plan your schedule around it. Most professors will not read your work carefully,respectfully and provide comments. A+
